titles: Pneumatou diakonia, or, Gospel-churches a standing ordinance of Jesus Christ to continue to his next personal glorious coming, plainly proved : objections particularly answer'd / by an unworthy servant ... R.B.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by T.M. for Tho. Parkhurst,
notes: First two words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
